name: DMM Pivot Belay Device
description: Belaying from the top of a pitch has never been easier. An innovative pivoting guide loop gives you the freedom to lower from above in a slow and controlled manner. Belaying 2 seconds? No problem, the Pivot lets you bring up 2 partners and gives you the option to lower one at a time. Designed to give you a smooth payout and a secure catch, the Pivot is a great choice for trad, ice, alpine and multi-pitch climbs.Made from aluminum alloy.Belay from the harness or a fixed anchor using the guide mode.Works with 7.5mm to 11mm ropes but is best with 8mm to 10.5mm.
